name: Inventory Menu Background
desc: Full-screen inventory panel. Aged parchment texture with leather corner reinforcements. Grid layout area for item slots.

name: Equipment Menu Background
desc: Equipment screen with character silhouette area on left, gear slots on right. Warm parchment with bronze clasps.

name: Status Menu Background
desc: Character status display. Scroll-like parchment with decorative header. Areas for portrait, stats, and memory fragment count.

name: Save Menu Background
desc: Save/load screen. Open book aesthetic with two pages. Left page for save slots, right page for preview. Warm candlelight glow.
